content:
Hello designers at Zulip,

I am Chetan Manda, a final year undergraduate student from IIT Guwahati, India.
I came across Zulip on the Gsoc website and I went through your open source work and found it really interesting.
I am a designer and I specialize in User Interface and User Experience design(UI/UX).
I have interned at various companies during the last four years and have executed end to end projects while interacting with key stakeholders, product managers, and developers.Here's a list of things that I do:
• Conduct User Research, develop low - high-fidelity wireframes, storyboards, user flows, screen flows, sitemaps, UI artefacts, prototyping, and Usability testing.
• Create exceptional user experiences for end-users and design internal/external user-facing products ensuring they are useful and usable by end-users.  
• Translate the concepts and agreed ideas into artwork and designs that bring simplicity and user-friendliness to complex design roadblocks.   
• Basic CSS, HTML
Here are a few of my works : https://www.behance.net/ChetanManda

I would love to work for your organization on any projects/tickets that I could help out on based on my abilities. I can put in 35-40 hours per work with proper dedication throughout the Summer and I am capable of learning new languages at a pretty fast pace. I would be really grateful if you could recommend any relevant project & mentor for me. Thanks in advance!

Cheers,
Chetan
PFA my resume
Resume.pdf

Welcome to Zulip! I'd really interesting to hear what kind of insights you have for us with reference to Zulip's design.
I think the best direction of action would be to just start conversations (topics in #design ) about where you think we could have changes/improvements... We also have some existing frontend issues that could use help with code, if you're interested in that.
